text: Dan Dawson (born December 11, 1981) is a Canadian professional lacrosse player for the Saskatchewan Rush of the National Lacrosse League, Brampton Excelsiors (MSL) of Major Series Lacrosse, and is a free agent in Major League Lacrosse. Category:1981 births Category:Lacrosse players Category:Sportspeople from Ontario Category:Living people
title: Dan Dawson
